halohud.title: Halo HUD

halohud.option.haloRadius.title: Radius of the main halo

halohud.option.halo2Radius.title: Radius of the secondary halo

halohud.option.attackIndicator.title: Vanilla Attack Indicator
halohud.option.attackIndicator.tooltip:
The attack indicator supersedes the vanilla attack indicator, so it is recommended not having it at the crosshair.
Particularly with small halos, it can conflict otherwise.
modmenu.summaryTranslation.halohud: Show a halo indicator around the crosshair.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.halohud: Shows health and hunger data close to the crosshair when not full, by drawing a halo style indicator.
